hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/image-charts/quickchart/instance
hooks.description: Override QuickChart settings for the chart.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/api/chart/data
gk/gravitycharts/api/chart/description
gk/gravitycharts/api/chart/options
gk/gravitycharts/api/field/options
hooks.description: Modifies the options for a specific field.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/api/js/json
hooks.description: Modifies the JSON string before it is returned.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/api/js/response
hooks.description: Modifies the response object before it is transformed into a JSON string.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/api/query
hooks.description: Modifies the `GF_Query` object used for a feed.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/capabilities/access
hooks.description: Modifies the default capability required to access the plugin.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/chart-library-options

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: Name of the library being used.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/color-palettes
hooks.description: Modifies the default colors used when creating a chart.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/feed/settings-fields
gk/gravitycharts/feed/settings-to-chart-library-options-map
hooks.description: Modifies a map of feed settings fields to Chart.js options.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/locale
hooks.description: Filters the locale for a feed.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale. Default: Site language returned by \{@see \get_bloginfo()\}.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycharts/timeline/label-formats
hooks.description: Filters the label formats for the timeline scales.

parameters.name: formats
parameters.description: The formats in an associative array, with the scale as key.
